title: MANOJ KUMAR AGARWAL
text: I've never seen such a pathetic application, especially one dealing in finance. I've used many other apps for investments, etc., but Groww came with a boatload of headaches! 1. MF investment was the worst experience I faced ‚Äì I decided to exit instantly and had to bear the exit load. 2. The IPO application seemed like some government office procedure ‚Äì so slow. 3. Customer support needs 24 hours for everything, even the smallest of things. I hate this app!
author: MANOJ KUMAR AGARWAL

title: allu gamer
text: Groww is a great platform with a clean and user-friendly interface. It‚Äôs perfect for both trading and investing. Order execution is fast, and the brokerage charges are very reasonable. One small suggestion: It would be really helpful if we could set stop loss and target directly on the chart (like by dragging or clicking on price levels). This feature would make intraday and scalping much easier. Overall, an excellent app! Thanks to the Groww team! üôèüìä

title: Swapnil Sawant
text: "Enough is enough! Groww app is a complete disaster when it comes to options trading. Every single time I‚Äôm in the middle of trading, the option chart freezes and gets stuck ‚Äì costing me time, money, and trust. This is not just a glitch, it‚Äôs a straight-up failure for a trading platform. I‚Äôm DONE with Groww and will never use this app again. If you can‚Äôt handle basic trading stability, you don‚Äôt deserve to be in the market. FIX YOUR PLATFORM or stop calling yourself a trading app!"
author: Swapnil Sawant
